mainTask.title: HT-026: Simple Integration Layer & Basic Automation
mainTask.description:
SIMPLE INTEGRATION LAYER & AUTOMATION: Build streamlined integration layer with basic automation orchestration, simple workflow management, and essential external service connectivity for agency custom micro-app toolkit.

**Mission:** Create a practical integration layer that enables basic automation orchestration, simple workflow management, and essential external service integration for custom micro-app delivery with ≤7-day deployment using AI assistance.

**Scope:** Simple integration layer with basic automation orchestration, simple workflow engine, essential external service connectors, basic webhook management, and straightforward automation capabilities for client micro-apps.

**Methodology:** AUDIT → DECIDE → APPLY → VERIFY with 10+ integration verification checkpoints, workflow testing, and automation validation.

**Business Impact:**
- Enable basic automation and simple workflow orchestration for clients
- Support essential external service integration and data flow
- Automate basic business processes and notifications
- Reduce manual intervention in client micro-app operations
- Create maintainable integration architecture for agency scalability
